mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (schedule_no, schedule_content, schedule_date, schedule_title, schedule_mountain_name, schedule_total_time, schedule_descent_time, schedule_ascent_time, schedule_difficulty, schedule_transportation, user_no) VALUES (seq_qna_no.NEXTVAL, #{contents}, #{scheduleDate}, #{title}, #{mountainName}, #{hikingTotalTime}, #{hikingDescentTime}, #{hikingAscentTime}, #{hikingDifficulty}, #{Transportation}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT s.schedule_no, s.user_no, s.schedule_title, s.schedule_content, s.schedule_date, s.schedule_mountain_name, s.schedule_total_time, s.schedule_descent_time, s.schedule_ascent_time, s.schedule_difficulty, s.schedule_transportation FROM schedule s, users u WHERE s.user_no = u.user_no

SELECT schedule_no, user_no, schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_date, schedule_mountain_name, schedule_total_time, schedule_descent_time, schedule_ascent_time, schedule_difficulty, schedule_transportation FROM schedule WHERE schedule_no = #{postNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET schedule_content = #{contents, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, schedule_title = #{title}, schedule_mountain_name = #{mountainName}, schedule_total_time = #{hikingTotalTime}, schedule_descent_time = #{hikingDescentTime}, schedule_ascent_time = #{hikingAscentTime}, schedule_difficulty = #{hikingDifficulty}, schedule_transportation = #{Transportation} WHERE schedule_no = #{postNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SCHEDULE WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND schedule_no = #{postNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM schedule WHERE SCHEDULE_MOUNTAIN_NAME = #{mountainName}
